ECOP KEEPING EDGECLIFF VILLAGE A SAFE AND GREAT PLACE TO LIVE
=============================================================

Edgecliff Village Citizens on Patrol (ECOPs) are a group of volunteer residents who have been trained to be extra eyes and ears for, and work cooperatively with, the Tarrant County Sheriff's Department. We drive and/or walk around the Village and report suspicious behavior and unsafe conditions. All interested citizens are invited to join in our efforts to keep Edgecliff Village a safe and great place to live. Additional volunteers are always needed. If this opportunity intrigues you,
and be part of ECOP's vital mission in safeguarding Edgecliff Village.
[***Join us***](https://form.jotform.com/232066485403050)
in creating a safer and more vibrant community together!
